subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: National and local level early recovery coordination mechanisms function in crisis affected districts, promoting an effective and efficient use of recovery resources, attention to local ownership and capacity building, and a smooth transition from humanitarian support to long term sustainable recovery.
subproject.title: Early Recovery Coordination &
